scripts.lint:case: git ls-files src/pages | grep -E '[A-Z].*\.jsx$' && (echo '❌ Case issue found in src/pages (uppercase JSX filename)'; exit 1) || echo '✅ case clean'
scripts.lint:imports-case: git grep -nE 'from \"\./pages/.*[A-Z]' src && (echo '❌ Uppercase import path found'; exit 1) || echo '✅ imports case clean'
scripts.prebuild: npm run lint:case && npm run lint:imports-case
scripts.plan:json:elite: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/gpt-plan -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"stackKey":"elite"}' | tee plan.json
scripts.plan:json:accelerator: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/gpt-plan -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"stackKey":"accelerator"}' | tee plan.json
scripts.plan:json:growth: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/gpt-plan -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"stackKey":"growth"}' | tee plan.json
scripts.plan:json:foundation: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/gpt-plan -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"stackKey":"foundation"}' | tee plan.json
scripts.plan:pdf: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/plan/pdf -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data-binary @plan.json -o StackScore-plan.pdf && (open StackScore-plan.pdf || true)
scripts.plan:pdf:elite: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/plan/pdf -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data-binary @plan.json -o StackScore-elite.pdf && (open StackScore-elite.pdf || true)
scripts.plan:pdf:accelerator: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/plan/pdf -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data-binary @plan.json -o StackScore-accelerator.pdf && (open StackScore-accelerator.pdf || true)
scripts.plan:pdf:growth: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/plan/pdf -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data-binary @plan.json -o StackScore-growth.pdf && (open StackScore-growth.pdf || true)
scripts.plan:pdf:foundation: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/plan/pdf -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data-binary @plan.json -o StackScore-foundation.pdf && (open StackScore-foundation.pdf || true)
scripts.test:pdf:elite: npm run plan:json:elite && npm run plan:pdf:elite
scripts.test:pdf:accelerator: npm run plan:json:accelerator && npm run plan:pdf:accelerator
scripts.test:pdf:growth: npm run plan:json:growth && npm run plan:pdf:growth
scripts.test:pdf:foundation: npm run plan:json:foundation && npm run plan:pdf:foundation
scripts.dev:api:chrome: PUPPETEER_EXECUTABLE_PATH='/Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome' nodemon --watch server --ext js,json --signal SIGTERM server/index.js
scripts.tw:bin: mkdir -p scripts/bin && ARCH=$(uname -m) && OS=$(uname -s) && if [ "$OS" = "Darwin" ]; then if [ "$ARCH" = "arm64" ]; then URL=https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/releases/download/v4.1.12/tailwindcss-macos-arm64; else URL=https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/releases/download/v4.1.12/tailwindcss-macos-x64; fi; else URL=https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/releases/download/v4.1.12/tailwindcss-linux-x64; fi; curl -L -o scripts/bin/tailwindcss "$URL" && chmod +x scripts/bin/tailwindcss && (xattr -d com.apple.quarantine scripts/bin/tailwindcss 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.postinstall: npm run tw:bin && npm run tw:verify
